content: eight crackers let's finish somewhere we haven't been in a while let's go back to
Farland Isle for some adventure in the jungle today I had a cool one for you
man-eating plants but we're gonna expand on that by having plants that don't look
the same plant that doesn't look man-eating and all of a sudden attacks
so that's kind of a cool concept that the players might move their character
next to it and then all of a sudden attack so let's go to the table and I'll
show you how to do that your adventurer may be going along in
the jungle and suddenly become very hot and want to take a rest under a nice
shady plant hmm this sounds good but beware because some plants may not be
what they seem alright to start this project I've got some toothpicks I've
cut the end off on and you may recognize those as pistachio shells there's gonna
be using our project and I'm uses hard modeling paste which is kind of a
splurge of mine but I really like the stuff okay so now I've got my pistachio
shells mmm nuts okay so now we're going to take the hard modeling paste and I'm
going to use a stiff brush and kind of fill that half shell in there okay and
then I can start poking those toothpick ends into the into the paste and that'll
hold them as well as give some nice texture of like the gums inside the pod
so yeah there we go nice I'll finish that up see the detail there okay so
I've got all the teeth in there looking really good I'll let that dry up okay
now I've got I'm gonna do two plants and I've got two of them here and I'll show
you the little details they're really nice holds those that paste holds those
teeth in there nicely now I need to make the two halves go together so I'm going
to use some hot glue on the there and it open like it's the
mouth is the mozz open ready to swallow a poor adventure let that harden up and
yeah looking good pull the wisps off there there yeah now
do the other one and you want to kind of do it like a different angle when you
put it together so they don't look exactly the same that's always kind of
nice to get some variation in your models just put that hot glue on there
between the two halves I'll let that harden up and wait for it yeah looking
good all right cool now move on to the next
step okay I got my modeling paste again and I'm gonna use this to put a little
bit extra reinforcement between the two shells also it'll cover that the to the
mark were they half there at the half shell there and it'll it'll look more
like a solid gaping maw as opposed to like two shells there we go just kind of
cover that up a bit it'll also strengthen it the stuff is
really nice and strong all right just kind of paint that on
blend it in very nice let those dry up okay now I also want to do the plant
that looks like it doesn't look dangerous right so I'm going to use the
two pistachio halves and just glue them together okay so you don't see any teeth
or anything so it just looks kind of innocuous yeah pull those players okay
so now I've got my coupe and my washers and I'm gonna Center the wash the
smaller washer over the bigger one and the washer is an inch and a half and I
just need I'm just using a smaller washer on top so no glue that on with
glue that will secure that nicely and this is gonna give the weight I need so
this plant won't tip over okay so I've got this all glued and dry
doesn't take very long now I'm gonna cover these up so I'm just gonna glue
them to the paper here this isn't technique you can do if you
don't wanted to slide around while you're working on them or try to hold
them when they're hot so I'll just start filling that in with some hot glue and
I'm taking special care to cover up that edge where the two washers meet okay and
then you just rip them off the paper pull some excess off you need to easy to
do and now I'm gonna rim the edge so it just doesn't look like a totally round
add just a little bit a different shape there there we go it's all done let that
harden oh okay now the secret to this craft is this cheap plant I bought this
I think I got this at the dollar store I like it because it has these pods as
well as the blooms of the flower so I thought that'd be great I could have the
the non dangerous ones in the pods and the sharpteeth ones in the flower so I'm
gonna cut those off I got the pod there and this was just two flowers so I'll
cut those off you know I want to keep that little nub at the bottom because
I'm gonna put that in the washer base right now I have these little plants I'm
going to use for the base to camouflage where the flower meets the ground so
there's a hole there but it's not quite big enough for the stub so I'm going to

and now I've got a nice little plow a nice little uh plant there cool all
